page.title: 05FLITWICK'S ANNUAL CARNIVAL.
page.content: FLITWICK'S CARNIVAL STARTED IN 1977 TO CELEBRATE THE SILVER JUBILEE AND HAS CARRIED ON FROM THERE. THERE ARE VARIOUS EVENTS BEFORE THE CARNIVAL DAY THESE INCLUDE THE CARNIVAL QUEEN AND PRINCESS COMPETITIONS AND CHILDREN'S SPORTS. THERE IS A FIVE MILE FUN RUN WHERE LOCAL ORGANIZATIONS CAN GET SPONERSHIP TO RAISE MONEY(THEY MUST PAY Â£5 TO ENTER). THE DINNER AND DANCE EVENING ALSO RAISES MONEY FOR THE CARNIVAL. ON THE ACTUAL DAY THERE IS A PROCESSION OF FLOATS WHERE PRIZES ARE AWARDED. IN THE AFTERNOON THERE IS A FANCY DRESS COMPETITION AND A HIRED HIGHLIGHT EVENT.ALSO THROUGHOUT THE DAY THERE ARE COMPETITIONS WHEN PRIZES CAN BE WON.LOCAL ORGANIZATIONS HAVE STALLS WHERE 10% OF THE PROFIT GOES TOWARDS THE FOLLOWING YEARS CARNIVAL. THERE IS A DANCE IN THE EVENING.
